data.name: TypeShouldBeAssemblyQualified
data.value: Type '{0}' name should be assembly qualified. For example 'ClassName, AssemblyName'

data.name: AnonymousTypesDiscouraged
data.value: For better generated code quality, define schemas instead of using anonymous types.

data.name: MsdnReferencesDiscouraged
data.value: For better generated code quality, remove all references to "msdn.microsoft.com".

data.name: APIVersionFormatIsNotValid
data.value: API Version must be in the format: yyyy-MM-dd, optionally followed by -preview, -alpha, -beta, -rc, -privatepreview.

data.name: HttpVerbIsNotValid
data.value: Permissible values for HTTP Verb are delete,get,put,patch,head,options,post.

data.name: ResourceModelIsNotValid
data.value: The id, name, type, location and tags properties of the Resource must be present with id, name and type as read-only

data.name: ResourceIsMsResourceNotValid
data.value: A 'Resource' definition must have x-ms-azure-resource extension enabled and set to true.

data.name: XmsClientNameInValid
data.value: Value of 'x-ms-client-name' cannot be the same as the property/model name.

data.name: DeleteMustHaveEmptyRequestBody
data.value: 'Delete' operation cannot have parameters in the request body.

data.name: SkuModelIsNotValid
data.value: Sku Model is not valid. A Sku model must have name property. It can also have tier, size, family, capacity as optional properties.

data.name: PutGetPatchResponseInvalid
data.value: {0} has different responses for PUT/GET/PATCH operations. The PUT/GET/PATCH operations must have same schema response.

data.name: OperationsAPINotImplemented
data.value: Operations API must be implemented for the service.

data.name: TrackedResourceIsNotValid
data.value: Tracked Resource failing validation is: {0}. Validation Failed: {1}. A Tracked Resource must have: 1. A Get Operation 2. A ListByResourceGroup operation with x-ms-pageable extension and 3. A ListBySubscriptionId operation with x-ms-pageable extension. 4. Type, Location, Tags should not be used in the properties.

data.name: BodyMustHaveSchema
data.value: Each body parameter must have a schema

data.name: BodyWithType
data.value: A body parameter cannot have a type, format, or any other properties describing its type.

data.name: ConflictingRef
data.value: Properties defined alongside $ref will be ignored according to JSON specification.

data.name: EmptyClientName
data.value: Empty x-ms-client-name property.

data.name: HeaderShouldHaveClientName
data.value: Each header parameter should have an explicit client name defined for improved code generation output quality.

data.name: InvalidDefault
data.value: The default value is not one of the values enumerated as valid for this element.

data.name: InvalidSchemaParameter
data.value: Only body parameters can have a schema defined.

data.name: UnknownFormat
data.value: '{0}' is not a known format.

data.name: MissingDescription
data.value: Consider adding a 'description' element, essential for maintaining reference documentation.

data.name: MissingRequiredProperty
data.value: '{0}' is supposedly required, but no such property exists.

data.name: NoDefinitionForPathParameter
data.value: Could not find a definition for the path parameter '{0}'

data.name: NoResponses
data.value: No responses defined.

data.name: OnlyOneUnderscoreAllowedInOperationId
data.value: Only 1 underscore is permitted in the operation id, following Noun_Verb conventions.

data.name: OperationIdMissing
data.value: OperationId is required for all operations. Please add it for '{0}' operation of '{1}' path.

data.name: TooManyBodyParameters
data.value: Operations can not have more than one 'body' parameter. The following were found: '{0}'

data.name: CodeGenerationError
data.value: Errors found during Swagger document validation.

data.name: XMSPathBaseNotInPaths
data.value: Paths in x-ms-paths must overload a normal path in the paths section.

data.name: DescriptionNotDescriptive
data.value: The value provided for description is not descriptive enough.

data.name: OperationIdNounInVerb
data.value: Per the Noun_Verb convention for Operation Ids, the noun '{0}' should not appear after the underscore.

data.name: InvalidConstraint
data.value: Constraint is not supported for this type and will be ignored.

data.name: NonAppJsonTypeNotSupported
data.value: Media types other than 'application/json' has limited support

data.name: SupportedSchemesWarningMessage
data.value: Non-HTTPS/HTTP schemes have limited support

data.name: OperationParametersNotAllowedMessage
data.value: Parameters "subscriptionId" and "api-version" are not allowed in the operations section

data.name: ServiceDefinitionParametersMissingMessage
data.value: Parameters "subscriptionId" or "api-version" are referenced but not defined in the parameters section of Service Definition

data.name: UniqueResourcePathsWarning
data.value: More than one resource path is not allowed in a single spec (found: {0}).

data.name: PathCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: path cannot be null or an empty string or a string with white spaces while getting the parent directory

data.name: GuidUsageNotRecommended
data.value: Guid used at the #/Definitions/{1}/.../{0}. Usage of Guid is not recommanded. If GUIDs are absolutely required in your service, please get sign off from the Azure API review board.

data.name: OperationNameNotValid
data.value: 'GET' operation must use method name 'Get' or Method name start with 'List', 'PUT' operation must use method name 'Create', 'PATCH' operation must use method name 'Update' and 'DELETE' operation must use method name 'Delete'.

data.name: LongRunningResponseNotValid
data.value: An operation with x-ms-long-running-operation extension must have a valid terminal success status code. 200 or 201 for Put/Patch. 200, 201 or 204 for Post. 200 or 204 or both for Delete.

data.name: InvalidMutabilityValues
data.value: Valid values for an x-ms-mutability extension are 'create', 'read' and 'update'. Applied extension contains invalid value(s): '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidMutabilityValueForReadOnly
data.value: When property is modeled as "readOnly": true then x-ms-mutability extension can only have "read" value. When property is modeled as "readOnly": false then applying x-ms-mutability extension with only "read" value is not allowed. Extension contains invalid values: '{0}'.

data.name: BooleanPropertyNotRecommended
data.value: Booleans are not descriptive and make them hard to use. Instead use string enums with allowed set of values defined: '{0}'.

data.name: AllowedTopLevelProperties
data.value: Top level properties should be one of name, type, id, location, properties, tags, plan, sku, etag, managedBy, identity. Extra properties found: "{0}".
